title: Placements
body: Anybody know how much you gotta win to get to Silver 5? or like tell me the ratios of how much games to win to get to a certain division?

replies.body: Depends on what rank you ended last season with
If you are u ranked 5 games are the usual standard
Before the season ended my friend won 3 and got s5, but it is usually 3,4,5? And if you do well then you should be alright. Good luck
Yeah i was b4 last season won 7/10 and got b4 once again but i have climbed swiftly

Depends on where you were placed last season.

If you are unranked and going into ranked for the first time. Winning your first couple games is the most important part.

Going W-W-W-W-W-L-L-L-L-L can get you High Bronze/ Low Silver. However going L-L-L-L-L-W-W-W-W-W will most likely get you low Bronze despite both records being 5-5.
